glosses: Used to represent a person, thing, event, situation etc. as lesser than what they seem or what they are; just, only

examples.text: Alt tarafı bir çiçek koklayıp, bir hayvan sahiplenip, birkaç insan tanıyıp, sevip gidecektik bu dünyadan. Nasıl kötü bir zamana denk geldi ömrümüz?
examples.translation: We were just going to smell a flower, adopt an animal, meet a few people, love and leave this world. How did our lives coincide with such a terrible time period?

examples.text: Dayakçı kızlardan birinin babası ise olayı, "Çoluk çocuk kavgası, çocuklar arasında problem. Alt tarafı bir iki kere kavga etmişler” diyerek savundu.
examples.translation: One of the attacker girls' father defended the incident saying "It's a kid's fight, a problem between the kids. They just fought a couple times."

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish آلت طرف (alt taraf, “the place or part lower down; the sequel of a thing, continuation”), from آلت (alt) and طرف (taraf), equivalent to alt (“lower, below, bottom”) + taraf (“side, face”) + -ı (possessive suffix), literally “the lower or bottom side”.
